comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Most likely Sweden's Foreign Minister, Richard Sandler.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Rickard Sandler was Prime Minister from January, 24 1925 to June, 7 1926 (the photo seems to be from 1925). He was Foreign Minister not before 1932 (according to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rickard_Sandler).
